txt.en: Since the arrival of Angmar, the Dead have occupied this land and their leader Vatar has existed since the Red-maid began to slip beyond the reach of nature.
Defeated wights within the Garth Agarwen fortress ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat wights within the Garth Agarwen fortress ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You should cleanse the ruins of Garth Agarwen of the wights who have so long stood a vigil over the continued corruption of the land. With them removed, perhaps healing can begin within the swamp of Agamaur.
